title: @Riot, a big thanks
body:
Hopefully a diamond in the rough of the hate on these boards

I just wanted to let you guys at Riot know that I love your game.

You never get told this enough no matter how many times I make a post like this.

I've been playing since I believe 2009 and I'm still super excited to start up this game every single day.

The new WW champ teaser was awesome, had the stupidest grin you'd ever see the entire time.

Keep going Riot!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Thanks bud that means the world to us, I had the same feeling watching the teaser for the first time. :)
Thanks! We appreciate the support, we'll try our best to keep making the game better and better. Cheers!
Excuse me, but I've lost my shiv. Could I borrow yours?
